title: UIDOL + UDL-Based Project Design for Supporting Students with Disabilities in Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Support for practical learning through language-focused project execution in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can design accessibility improvements for online learning materials by applying UIDOL and UDL principles
Learners can analyze learning barriers by disability type and propose customized support strategies
Learners develop inclusive language learning content reflecting peer feedback using PBL methodologies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
